testcase.classname: Verify address details in checkout page
testcase.system-out: Given the user Launch URL...................................................passed Then the user Verify that home page is visible successfully.................passed When the user Click Signup - Login button...................................passed And the user Fill all details in Signup and create account..................passed Then the user Verify ACCOUNT CREATED!.......................................passed When the user click Continue button.........................................passed Then the user Verify Logged in as username at top..........................passed When the user Add products to cart..........................................passed And the user Click Cart button..............................................passed Then the user Verify that cart page is displayed............................passed When the user Click Proceed To Checkout.....................................passed Then the user Verify that the delivery address is same address filled at the time registration of account.passed Then the user Verify that the billing address is same address filled at the time registration of account.passed When the user Click Delete Account button...................................passed Then the user Verify ACCOUNT DELETED! and click Continue button.............passed
